- Notes

"Hard Rave Soundz" is the past, the present and the future! The first
compilation that connects the current EDM sound with the classic styles Hard
Trance, Dancecore and Hardstyle! The connection of new and fresh tracks as
well as well known classics and forgotten gems all in the name of the harder
rave styles! Some tracks will be digitally released for the first time and
some will be even exclusive to this series! On top of this there will be two
dj mixes also exclusive to this compilation! One always provided by a special
featuring guest who will also contribute some of his productions and releases!
For volume 1 we are proud to have Derb aka Hennes&Cold on board, one of the
godfathers of Hard Trance music that was a the major artist on labels like
Overdose and Tracid Traxx! Get ready for Hard Rave Soundz!

We are a young group with over 5000 releases,
